Get to know our staff!

1/5

Camsu

Camsu is the boss of the cat cafe, punching anyone who tries to dethrone her. She is a polydactyl cat, meaning she has extra thumbs on her big paws.

1/5

Vili

Vili likes to hunt, explore the great outdoors and sit like a human :D

1/5

Luna

Luna's favorite activity is to steal food and run at a very fast speed from one room to another.

1/5

Floricica

She is grumpy but caring and lovable. She really likes salmon.

1/1

Katara

Katara is 3 years old. She is very playful and hyperactive.

1/1

Bumi

Bumi is 3 years old. He is very relaxed and patient.

1/1

Charles

Charles is 2 years old and very cuddly. His best friend is Mimi.

1/1

Mimi

Mimi is a very active and playful Kitten. Both Mimi and Charles are social and befriend anyone who gives them treats :D

1/1

Kiko

Kiko likes to sleep and wreak havoc when not sleeping.

1/1

Lily

Lilly is a bit shy, but one she gets to know someone she becomes extremely cuddly and sometimes also climbs on your shoulder. You can always win her over with food, especially chicken nuggets. Lilly likes to open doors herself and is an expert in opening any sort of food container.

1/1

Mika

Mika is a bit sickly but has a big heart and lots of energy.

1/1

Minou

Minou is our oldest lady. But she is still cute.

1/1

Nami

Nami can be shy at first but is really cuddly after a few minutes. She is also very playfull and loves to chase toys around. Nami is very vocal and constantly. She is trained to meow when someone claps and can come to you by command. She will do anything for food.

1/1

Pumpkin

Pumpkin loves any kind of attention. He even purrs when you just talk to him or pet the cat next to him. Pumpkin loves people and always wants to be around then. He can be quite clumsy and has a tendency to him his head on things . Pumpkin loves belly rubs and will do anything for them.

1/1

Twix

Twix is a very open cat. He loves to be the center of attention around strangers. He is also very cuddly but can sometimes be a troublemaker by pushing things off counters or biting when he doesn't get his food on time.

1/1

Teppo

This is Teppo, 6 year old ginger cat who loves bellyrubs, food, and to bother his parents by screaming senselessy at nothing

1/1

Tiger

Tiger is a typical ginger cat. 0% brain, but super cuddly and looks a bit derpy sometimes.

1/1

Tommy

Tommy likes to stroll around and occasionally beats up other cats. Thats why he is missing a piece of his ear and one claw.
